abstract: Analysis; NBA labor deal is about 95 percent done, but with four weeks of season already gone and more games in jeopardy, owners and players are still fighting over how to split $4 billion in revenues.
snippet: Four weeks of games are gone, and more could fall, because owners and players are still fighting over how to split $4 billion in revenues.
lead_paragraph: Four weeks of games are gone, and more could fall, because owners and players are still fighting over how to split $4 billion in revenues.

headline.main: N.B.A. Deal Is Tantalizingly Close, but Last Hurdle Is a Big One
headline.print_headline: Some of Season Is Lost, but N.B.A. Deal Is Tantalizingly Close
headline.seo: N.B.A. Deal Is Close, but Last Hurdle Is a Big One
